23-004HR.summary: Recommendation to approve minutes for the Equity and Human Relations Commission Special Meeting of Wednesday, January 11, 2023.A motion was made by Commissioner Schultz, seconded by Commissioner Allen, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 12 - Cory Allen, Sharifa Batts, Robbie Butler, Trace Camacho, Christopher Covington, Zuleimy Delgadillo, Lissette Flores, Eduardo Lara, Zoe Nicholson, Jon Schultz, Amy Eriksen and Alyssa GutierrezAbsent: 2 - Keyona Montgomery and Chanel SmithPUBLIC COMMENTNo members of the public addressed the Commission.CHAIR REMARKSChair Gutierrez provided opening remarks.Tony Viramontes, Equity and Community Engagement Program Specialist, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Chair Gutierrez and Tony Viramontes, Equity and Community Engagement Program Specialist.Commissioner Nicholson spoke.Chair Gutierrez spoke.UNFINISHED BUSINESSPage 2 of 8TELECONFERENCE, 6:00 PMWEDNESDAY, FEBRUARY 1, 2023CITY OF LONG BEACHEQUITY AND HUMAN RELATIONS COMMISSION MINUTES2.
